column5: I have been using a bow for many years now, Hoyt, Bow tech and so on. Now my bud wants to buy a bow and is looking at a Diamond. Anyone use them? Any reviews, good or bad? Are they low end or high end? Thanks Daniel
Sorry found the info I needed. Apparently there made by bowtech.  Sorry again
My buddy has a diamond marquis and its a very quiet and fast bow.
The Diamond Black Ice is a nice bow, very solid back wall but jumps a hair I found. Good deal for the money tho!! I boought a Hoyt Katera and love it, smooth, fast and forgiving.

I shoot the Diamond Justice, works great, not a problem with it so far. They are made by Bowtech they only use a single freedom cam though unlike the bowtech bows. I would recommend it as they are a good value and high quality bow. And they have the new model for this year out. It is in the BPS flyer for around 350 in a package...
There are very few BAD bows these days. It's all about adding the best components & set-up.
i use the 08 Diamond Justice  BPS has a deal on an 09 Diamond package for under $400 Im tempted aha
Thanks, sounds like it a good bow. I will let my buddy know. For me I think I will put an AlphaMax under the tree this year, I love the cam and 1/2.  Thanks again Daniel
